Label.en: Making it the family, all-day experience that we see now in modern centres
Label.fr: Conduisant à terme aux expéditions familliales dans les centres commerciaux
Label.es: Making it the family, all-day experience that we see now in modern centres
Label.zh: Making it the family, all-day experience that we see now in modern centres

Label.en: There were rooms for men to read in while their wives shopped
Label.fr: Il y avait des salles de lecture, à l'usage des hommes, pendant que leurs épouses faisaient leurs courses
Label.es: There were rooms for men to read in while their wives shopped
Label.zh: There were rooms for men to read in while their wives shopped

Label.fr: Des salles de jeu pour les enfants...

Label.en: And even female toilets... which didn't exist outside of the home until that point!
Label.fr: Et des toilettes pour les femmes... qui n'existaient pas vraiement en dehors du domicile auparavant !
Label.es: And even female toilets... which didn't exist outside of the home until that point!
Label.zh: And even female toilets... which didn't exist outside of the home until that point!

Label.en: Actually, Le Bon Marché made great steps in improving life for women
Label.fr: En fait, Le Bon Marché pris d'importantes mesures pour améliorer la vie des femmes
Label.es: Actually, Le Bon Marché made great steps in improving life for women
Label.zh: Actually, Le Bon Marché made great steps in improving life for women

Label.en: No need to get aggressive... I'm just the narrator!
Label.fr: Eh, tout doux... je ne suis que le narrateur !
Label.es: No need to get aggressive... I'm just the narrator!
Label.zh: No need to get aggressive... I'm just the narrator!

Label.en: Actually, Le Bon Marché made great steps in improving life for women
Label.fr: En fait, Le Bon Marché pris d'importantes mesures pour améliorer la vie des femmes
Label.es: Actually, Le Bon Marché made great steps in improving life for women
